page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content: On schooldays the S.18 bus leaves Aberangell at 8.08 & returns from Machynlleth at 3.36.There is a bus on Weds & Sats leaving Aberangell at 9.32 & returning from Machynlleth at 11.45 leaving here again at 12.32 & returning at 3.45. This journey is also extended to Dinas Mawddwy,4 miles beyond Aberangell. The Weds & Sats buses are also the only connections for a train to Shrewsbury at 10.53.Wed is market day at Machynlleth. The 12.40 train from Shrewsbury is the only connection with the Aberangell bus. Life would be easier if we could stop the train at Cemmaes Road. An extra bus to Barmouth runs on 5 Thurs in mid summer. Because of the inadequate bus service, workers must own cars. 44 families have cars. Huge lorries carry wood from the Dyfi forest.
